name: logseq-search
title: Logseq Search
description: Search your Logseq DB graph directly from Raycast
author: kerim

commands.name: search-logseq
commands.title: Search Logseq
commands.description: Search pages in your Logseq DB graph

preferences.name: graphName
preferences.title: Default Graph Name (Optional)
preferences.description: Default graph name - you can also select from the dropdown in the search interface

preferences.name: serverUrl
preferences.title: Server URL
preferences.description: URL of the Logseq HTTP server

preferences.name: maxResults
preferences.title: Max Results
preferences.description: Maximum number of search results to display

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
